    • Method Detail

      • convertCurrencyToEuro

        public java.math.BigDecimal convertCurrencyToEuro(java.math.BigDecimal initAmount,
                                                  java.lang.String currencyID)
        Converts a currency to Euros.
        Parameters:
        initAmount: - the amount of money to be converted into Euros
        currencyID: - the 3 letter currency ID of the initAmount.
        Returns:
        the equivalent amount of Euros based on initAmount and currencyID

      • convertFromEuroToCurrency

        public java.math.BigDecimal convertFromEuroToCurrency(java.math.BigDecimal initAmount,
                                                      java.lang.String currencyID)
        Converts Euros to another currency.
        Parameters:
        initAmount: - amount of Euros to change
        currencyID: - what to change the Euros into
        Returns:
        equivalent amount of target currency given the initAmount in Euros
